website_summaries.verdict: This clear coat works well for some applications. It doesn't finish as hard as others, though, and you won't mistake it for a spray-gun application.
pros: Apply directly to painted surfaces with minimal preparation
Can be applied directly to stainless steel surfaces
cons: Does not give a high-gloss finish
Spray nozzle does not always spray cleanly

customer_reviews.title: Keep the can moving at a moderate pace, it covers well and fast
customer_reviews.text: “Key”don’t hold can closer than 12”: 2 light coats 1 medium with faster than slower strokes If to heavy you’ll get the white milky run, BUT goes away as it dries so don’t attempt to finger smear it if it has a lump let dry and hand sand it out then recoat no biggie Let dry 48 hrs.....seriously you’ll get that satin look with a nice finish, especially over a textured paint job
customer_reviews.author: Christopher R.

customer_reviews.title: Everything written on the can is a lie!
customer_reviews.text: It says in big letters right on the can "Non-Yellowing", what a load of crap! This yellowed immediately after drying for 2 days. Followed directions to a 'T' and the final result is not smooth, not crystal clear, and has yellowed my white metal plate terribly. If you are using this on something white, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: So Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I don't know. Maybe I received a bad can? I was hoping this was going to be a cheaper poor man's version of Spraymaxx 2K Clear. Boy.. was I wrong: -This thing sprayed with ZERO gloss - Cloudy result. I sprayed thin coats 6 inches from part The hype surrounding this product is well.... unfounded... :(
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great clear coating crank baits after painting. All I ever use now
customer_reviews.author: JPW Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Used the whole can, not much shine or gloss after drying
customer_reviews.text: After using an entire can, and following the directions on the can carefully, I can honestly say that this product isn't terrible, but it's not terrific either. After three solid coats, and correct hourly drying time, There simply wasn't much shine or gloss. It goes on fine (be sure to use precautions when using), the dry time seems to go along with the directions, but the overall affect simply wasn't what I had hoped it would be. Yes, there certainly is shine, but I think you really have to look hard in some excellent light. I wouldn't purchase it again, unless they improved the gloss once it dries.
customer_reviews.author: Garandguy76

customer_reviews.title: NOT HIGH GLOSS AS IT SHOULD BE
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to me as a great high gloss to put over glitter and to put over my headlights to keep them from oxidation. So far, I’m getting a very flat finish over glitter, so I’m not sure I want to put over my headlights. I had to make sure I ordered the high gloss. My order says high gloss but nowhere on the can does it say high gloss. I will be returning and ordering direct from KBS
customer_reviews.author: vanessa

customer_reviews.title: O.O
customer_reviews.text: If you put on the work on prep work turns out great...
customer_reviews.author: Brian Key

customer_reviews.title: Worked fantastic on stainless steel !!️
customer_reviews.text: Love this clear coat for the stainless steel backsplash tiles that are worked in with the natural stone tiles. Those little stainless steel tiles always looked bad until I recently clearcoated them. Before clearcoat I had to use a stainless steel cleaner to polish them and be super careful not to get any of the black tarnish on the grout, as it stained the grout and natural stone tiles.
customer_reviews.author: Heike Stroup

customer_reviews.title: flat! MATTE!! NO SHINE
customer_reviews.text: I have used KBS DIAMOND CLEAR in the past but in the can form and sprayed and achieved great results. But it did chip over time and scratch so i i had to redo my hood so i striped all the coating off correctly and properly cleaned and hit it with the KBS aerosol. 2 full cans! WTH!. ITS Matte Flat. No shine. Dull as ever. I will never use this agin.
customer_reviews.author: Churst816

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this clear several different items. One of them being a set of taillights that I blacked out. I put about 8-10 coats of this stuff on and about 90% of it dried shiny but there were sever dry spots that weren't shiny that were very noticeable. I ended up having to wet sand them and go over top with another clear.
customer_reviews.author: tyler w.

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I had difficulty getting a consistent stream when applying it to my painted items. Sometimes, an orange peel look, sometimes it sprayed smoothly and covered nicely. I am not sure if I had a defective can, as this was a first time use, but am hesitant to try again. One of the items (yard art) that I had used this on as a sealant, managed to have the paint run after a hard rain.
customer_reviews.author: ann k.

customer_reviews.title: Great for clear coating stainless.
customer_reviews.text: This clearcoat went on easy and was able to recoat within 20 minutes. I used it on a piece of stainless steel made for a faucet base plate. So far, after a month, the coating still looks like new. I'm sure I will find other uses for this great product.
customer_reviews.author: Firedog

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it zero stars, I would. This product literally destroyed our paint job instead of clear coating it. It caused it to become cloudy. Horrible! Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: K. Gile

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with the application of this product. I applied as directions stated and each light cost produced fade lines like pictures. I am going to wait the 48 hours as directed for full cure and then try to wet sand with a 3000 or 6000 grit sandpaper. If that doesn’t work, I’ll try another product.
customer_reviews.author: B. B. Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: I have finished two diamond painting projects and this product sealed both very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Issaquah WA

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: Works ok. After more than one layer the clear coat get cloudy and looks messy. Dries fast. It's worth spending a little more on something else for better quality. This product is good for quick fixes that don't require any detail.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Clearcoat
customer_reviews.text: I used this to refinish my pitted machined wheels. I used scotch bright to clean them up after stripping the clear off, then machine polished them. This clear adheres well and flows out like a factory clear, very pleased with the results. Note: After storing the wheels for the summer in a dark shed, I was surprised how badly they yellowed and as surprised when the yellowing went away after 2 days in the natural light. Something to do with the UV shield protection?
customer_reviews.author: Jimweis

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Love the non-areosal KBS and this seems to be just as good. Convenient for small quick projects. Levels nice and dries quick.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Smith

customer_reviews.title: Test on small area to insure your work doesn't get ruined!
customer_reviews.text: I give a low rate simply because, after numerous attempts on various paints, I experienced Haze and fogging. After reading the direction on the can it appeared to be compatible with my product. Nope disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Good with very small objects
customer_reviews.text: Product does not atomize properly. Had to hold can three inches from object to get it to flash. This was my second can. Recommend the non aerosol. It is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: greg gillham

customer_reviews.title: Don't understand why this product has good reviews
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this sporadically over the last month and I do not see why this was worth $20. I feel I could have gotten the same from RustoLeum Clear Coat for mush less money with same results.
customer_reviews.author: JHack

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: I airbrush my own lures and was looking for a clear hard coating to protect them. It’s easy to apply and sets up clear if you use several light coats. The fish were hard on it though and I had to repaint and coat my lures.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hartman

customer_reviews.title: WHAT YOU DONT KNOW ABOUT THIS PRODUCT ⭐⭐⭐⭐
customer_reviews.text: Please be advised that if you by this product you will HAVE TO WET SAND AND BUFF IT WITH A MACHINE AFTER YOU APPLY IT. Wait at least (24 to 48 hours) depending how much you applied. If you are looking for it to come out like glass IT WONT. The product needs to be WET SANDED WITH 2000 GRIT SAND PAPER. This CLEAR needs to be applied like all the others. ***IF YOU ARE UNSURE OF WHAT TO DO WATCH INSTRUCTIONAL VIDEOS ON YOUTUBE TO HELP YOU SO YOU ACHIEVE THE BEST RESULTS***
customer_reviews.author: BellaRoma Italian

customer_reviews.title: Impressive.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for direct to metal application. Incredible sticking power. Could place on end of hammer and not worry about coming off.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Estrada

customer_reviews.title: good stuff
customer_reviews.text: product star rating should be good enough should not have to write something in order for the star rating to be excepted !
customer_reviews.author: Rachel life

customer_reviews.title: Nice look
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting this to work as good as it did! Almost matched factory finish, easy to use. Let's see how long it last and yes at this point would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Spanky

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this to make custom cups, it works really well to seal the glitter the, followed up with the diamond clear coat paint version. Extremely durable
customer_reviews.author: Laura Houston

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: I have used numerous clear coat sprays. This is by far the best!
customer_reviews.author: Russell Pannone

customer_reviews.title: Can does not spray
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this and received it yesterday, I was able to get time to use it today and went to spray the can and nothing came out. I shook the can, tried to spray from different angles and noting. Once I was able to get some out it caused an orange peel look on the paint because it was coming out in bigger droplets.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Albrecht

customer_reviews.title: Works great clear coating lures
customer_reviews.text: Works great clear coating lures after painting. Holds up well and the colors do not run. Light coats works best
customer_reviews.author: S.Smith

customer_reviews.title: Useful, but not as good as the brush-able
customer_reviews.text: I can see where this is useful in some applications but do not expect the same results that you get from the liquid type. It takes longer to cure, needs many many coats, and is not as glossy.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: WAY OVERPRICED. it dulled my glitter and not at all wortg $20 a can
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Bender

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Sprayed on without drips. It's been a month-rain and snow- no show of the rust coming back in the dented area.
customer_reviews.author: Apollo

customer_reviews.title: Works excellent crystal clear!
customer_reviews.text: Came out exactly how it says crystal clear..no runs or problems. You have to spray it correctly and it comes out like professional clear. Take your time!!!! Other brand 2k spray max I would not recommend it it will turn yellow on white.
customer_reviews.author: apt9

customer_reviews.text: Use: coating steel printer rollers Pro: looks great, works for what I used it, protect trued surface
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Pretty splotchy coverage and kinda pricey. Much smoother spray results from Dupli-color Perfect Match product.
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Works well but doesn't cure as hard as they claim.
customer_reviews.text: Works well but doesn't cure as hard as they claim.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas G

customer_reviews.title: the can lies
customer_reviews.text: Can says "non-yellowing" it's yellow. It also left bubbles. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: derek lathan

customer_reviews.title: Good Clear but
customer_reviews.text: This is a good clear coat, sprays nice and goes on smooth but it is a semi gloss not a satin. Leaves a nice finish.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Burke

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy spray cans.
customer_reviews.text: Did not cover well. The product dried as if it was satin or dull. Definitely not High gloss as says in add. Not happy with results. I used the gallon to brush on and definitely not close to those results.
customer_reviews.author: daniel arno

customer_reviews.title: Great for sealing coasters!
customer_reviews.text: This works great on my alcohol ink coasters. Finally I found a great product.
customer_reviews.author: sherry

customer_reviews.title: Durable but does add sheen
customer_reviews.text: Not as "flat" a finish as I'd hoped for. More semi-gloss than satin I think. Definitely durable though.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Gonglik

customer_reviews.title: Very bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Very bad quality. The worst. If you want to get rid of your car, buy these products.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: Works well, not glossy
customer_reviews.text: Goes on smooth, looking nice. Gloss it is not, more of a satin.
customer_reviews.author: Duane Morris

product_meta.title: KBS Coatings 8114 Clear High Gloss Diamond Finish Clear Aerosol, Covers 35 sq ft
product_meta.description: Color:Clear High GlossDiamondFinish Clear is a tough Clear Coat that can be applied to painted surfaces and direct to steel surfaces. This water clear high gloss clear coat remains permanently flexible and is able to perform in the toughest environments without yellowing, cracking or peeling. Each can covers at least 35 sq ft.
feature_bullets: DiamondFinish Clear is formulated to apply directly over other coatings or direct to steel surfaces
DiamondFinish Clear can be applied directly to painted surfaces with very minimal surface prep. Protects and adds gloss!
DiamondFinish Clear is incredibly tough and hard like no other clear coat on the market
DiamondFinish Clear is a water clear High Gloss clear coat remains permanently flexible and is able to perform in the toughest environments without yellowing, Cracking or peeling
DiamondFinish Clear is 100% UV stable and provides high chemical resistance

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars146 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
